Attributes.description: Seismic loading and its effect on earth structures; dynamic response of single, and multi-degree of freedom systems and continuous systems; behaviour of soil under dynamic loading; pore pressure generation and liquefaction effects; seismicity and seismic design parameters; dynamic analysis of earth structures; seismic design of soil-structure systems.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Tue, Start Time: 9:30, End Time: 10:30, Building: To, Room: Be
